title: China Wilderness-Inspired Shennongjia Retreat with Impressive Wellness Area
description: The emerald mountains and vast forests of Shennongjia's wilderness area are guaranteed to take your breath away, with no better base for experiencing it all than at Crowne Plaza Shennongjia, an IHG Hotel. The design of this stunning hotel is inspired by the natural surroundings, with windows opening onto spellbinding landscapes. When hunger hits, Shennong Hui Chinese Restaurant offers Hubei cuisine to tempt you. Meanwhile, a spectacular swimming pool and sauna set a relaxing tone.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Shennongjia, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.2 Ji Chang Road, Hongping Town, Shennongjia 442400, China
